item.title: Ancestors: The Humankind Odyssey Is Coming to The Game Awards 2018 - IGN
item.description:
Ancestors: The Humankind Odyssey Is Coming to The Game Awards 2018  IGN

By Colin Stevens Ancestors: The Humankind Odyssey, a third-person open world survival game from the creator of Assassin's Creed, will be coming to The ...
